refnamediv.refpurpose: Get number of milliseconds from system epoch

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
msec_time
returns the number of milliseconds since system epoch. It is useful for benchmarking purposes, timing operations, etc.

refsect2.title: No parameters
refsect2.para: The function does not take parameters.

refsect1.title: Return Values
refsect1.para:
A 32-bit integer
no. of milliseconds since system epoch.
